GUIDE

Best AI Website Builders for Landing Pages

Top AI website builders for creating high-converting landing pages. Compare Mixo, Strikingly, Framer, Unicorn, and more for one-page sites.

Top Recommendations

Mixo (8.5/10) - Fastest: Generate landing pages in under 60 seconds. Built-in SEO included.

Framer (8.8/10) - Best Design: Gorgeous templates with code export option. Professional results.

Strikingly (7.8/10) - Mobile-First: Excellent mobile optimization. Perfect for mobile traffic.

Durable (8.5/10) - With CRM: Landing page + customer management in one platform.

Quick Comparison

Builder Score Speed Best For Price
Mixo 8.5/10 Under 60 seconds Fastest launch $9-15/mo
Strikingly 7.8/10 2-3 minutes Mobile optimization $9-15/mo
Framer 8.8/10 3-5 minutes Design quality $9-15/mo
Unicorn Platform 7.5/10 1-2 minutes Absolute beginners $9-15/mo
Durable 8.5/10 1-2 minutes Marketing + CRM $9-15/mo

Essential Landing Page Elements

Must-Have Elements

  • ●Clear headline: Immediately communicate what you offer
  • ●Compelling subheadline: Expand on the value proposition
  • ●Hero image or video: Visual representation of your offering
  • ●Benefits list: What visitors gain (not just features)
  • ●Social proof: Testimonials, reviews, or trust badges
  • ●Strong CTA: Clear, action-oriented button

Conversion Optimization Tips

  • ●One primary CTA: Don't confuse visitors with multiple actions
  • ●Above the fold: Put key info where visitors see it immediately
  • ●Mobile-first: Most traffic is mobile - optimize accordingly
  • ●Fast loading: Every second counts - optimize images and code
  • ●A/B testing: Test headlines, CTAs, and layouts
  • ●Clean design: Remove distractions that don't support conversion

All recommended builders offer free trials. Test a few to find your favorite workflow.
